name: Fran K
text: I would give a zero if it would let me. I DO NOT RECOMMEND to anyone!!!  Long story short I ordered a cooper color roof. What I got was 2 different shades of cooper " because it comes from different distributors they can not guarantee the exact shade" so now I have a very expensive check board roof that is completely unacceptable. The manager Cory says it's my problem and I will need to pay if I want new ones that match.

name: mike piliponis
text: Good place to buy roof panels

name: Larry Kraft
text: Hey been helping me for 20years very happy

text: Love dealing with Jimmy and ms Tonya...  They will help u with anything. Great prices too

name: 7thSon Productions
text: A good experience and education in metal roofing.

name: Harvey Wright
text: Was a great place to do business they get you in loaded and on your way will definitely use them again and again

name: James Bradley
text: First time customer and will continue to use. They want to make the sale and they want to help you. You can't beat a company with good customer service.
